examples: a piece of high grade building land He still wants to play top grade football.

meanings.meaning: mark given for a piece of work/an exam

examples: The oral exam constitutes 10% of the final grade.
She got very good grades in her exams.

meanings.meaning: level of importance/level of pay at work

examples: He has asked to be put onto a higher grade. large pay rises for senior grades
She was offered a job at a lower grade.
